mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.flash_promotion_price, r.flash_promotion_count, r.flash_promotion_limit, r.flash_promotion_id, r.flash_promotion_session_id, r.product_id, r.sort, p.id p_id, p.`name` p_name, p.goods_sn p_product_sn, p.price p_price, p.stock p_stock FROM young_seckill_promotion_product_relation r LEFT JOIN young_goods p ON r.product_id = p.id WHERE r.flash_promotion_id = #{flashPromotionId} AND r.flash_promotion_session_id = #{flashPromotionSessionId} ORDER BY r.sort DESC
